activity.title: Play some games
activity.discription: Even just a game of pool every few hours is enough to put a smile on our faces. Not only does it make us happy but we often end up chatting about projects over the pool table, giving us a fresh new perspective to take back to our desks.

activity.title: Go out together
activity.discription: Have fun with your whole team by going for regular days and/or nights out. Going out together as a team is a great way to get everyone having fun and forming relationships outside of work that could inspire collaboration back in the office.

activity.title: Talk to a friend
activity.discription: When something's really bothering you it can help you to share your feelings with your friend.

activity.title: Decorate the Workplace.
activity.discription: Remember, your office is a reflection of your brand. Decorating in accordance with your brand will help your team stay in touch with it.

activity.title: Celebrate small wins
activity.discription: one of the biggest influences on workplace happiness and productivity is the “progress principle”.

activity.title: Share photos of your children or pets
activity.discription: Showing photos of your kid or pet to co-workers can help your team establish friendships, creating a happier and more loyal workforce.

activity.title: Start planning a vacation
activity.discription: Leaving the confines of the office for a team-building trip gets employees out of their typical work environment and provides an opportunity for new learning and experiences.

activity.title: Create a Humor Bulletin Board.
activity.discription: Bring more humor into the workplace by starting a humor bulletin board.

activity.title: Have a “Success Bell”.
activity.discription: When someone in the office helps a client or makes a new sale they ring a bell and everyone cheers.

activity.title: Set Up a Humor Room
activity.discription: Bring more laughter into the office by turning the coffee room into a humor room. Stock it with stand-up comedy routines on DVD or audio tapes.
